title: NCLAT approves settlement plan for Asian hotels
description: The promoters, who operate the Hyatt Regency hotel near Mumbai airport, offered to pay the entire claims of lenders, trade creditors, employees and government dues, but the plan was rejected by the largest lender - UV Asset Reconstruction Company (ARC).
